title: AI Practical Competency Enhancement: Virtual Reality Science Education Design Based on Systems Thinking

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can observe scientific phenomena in VR environments and design interactive experiments by applying systems thinking techniques.
Learners can evaluate their ability to analyze complex scientific concepts multidimensionally using VR tools.
Learners can develop scientific problem-solving strategies through team-based VR simulation activities and incorporate peer feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
